import React from 'react'; import servicesIllustration from '../assets/services-illustration.svg'; const Services = () => { const services = [ { title: 'Social Media Management', icon: 'fas fa-share-alt', description: 'Comprehensive management of your social media presence across all platforms.', features: [ 'Content creation and curation', 'Community management', 'Engagement monitoring', 'Performance analytics' ] }, { title: 'Content Strategy', icon: 'fas fa-pencil-alt', description: 'Strategic content planning to engage your audience and drive conversions.', features: [ 'Content calendar development', 'Brand voice guidelines', 'Content optimization', 'Trend analysis' ] }, { title: 'Paid Advertising', icon: 'fas fa-ad', description: 'Targeted advertising campaigns to reach your ideal customers.', features: [ 'Campaign strategy', 'Budget optimization', 'A/B testing', 'ROI tracking' ] }, { title: 'Analytics & Reporting', icon: 'fas fa-chart-line', description: 'Data-driven insights to measure and improve your social media performance.', features: [ 'Performance metrics', 'Competitor analysis', 'Custom reports', 'Growth recommendations' ] }, { title: 'Influencer Marketing', icon: 'fas fa-users', description: 'Strategic partnerships with influencers to amplify your brand message.', features: [ 'Influencer identification', 'Campaign management', 'Partnership negotiations', 'Performance tracking' ] } ]; return (

Our Services

We offer comprehensive social media solutions to help your business grow and thrive in the digital landscape. Our expert team combines creativity with data-driven strategies to deliver exceptional results.

{services.map((service, index) => (

); }; export default Services;
